titles.title: He Did That Act
He Did That Act
To require the President to report to Congress on authorities relating to the stabilization and reduction of gas prices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

bill.summary:
He Did That Act
This bill requires the President to report within 30 days to Congress about existing authorities for stabilizing and lowering gas prices.
